body: Nkunda responds to attacks on Human Rights Watch: "I need to remind my readers that human rights watch has been one of the most vocal defenders of democracy in Rwanda. The organization, through the late Allison Des Forge, was the first to raise the alarm on the killings that were taking place during the 1994 period."
original_body: Nkunda responds to attacks on Human Rights Watch: "I need to remind my readers that human rights watch has been one of the most vocal defenders of democracy in Rwanda. The organization, through the late Allison Des Forge, was the first to raise the alarm on the killings that were taking place during the 1994 period."
title: Rwanda: Stop misplaced attack on Human Rights Watch

sentence: Nkunda responds to attacks on Human Rights Watch: "I need to remind my readers that human rights watch has been one of the most vocal defenders of democracy in Rwanda.
The organization, through the late Allison Des Forge, was the first to raise the alarm on the killings that were taking place during the 1994 period."
